scrabble

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrabble.Frame

  • public class Frame
extends java.lang.Object
    Frame acts as the tray of 7 tiles given to each player. Frames can be filled and refilled using refill(Pool) method. You can check if the frame contains certain tiles and additionally remove specified tiles from the frame.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Frame()
      Initializes Frame with an empty list of tiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Tile> getTiles()
      Gets the list of tiles.
      boolean hasTile(Tile letter)
      Checks if Frame has given tile
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the frame is empty.
      void refill(Pool pool)
      Refills frame with tiles from given Pool.
      Tile removeTile(Tile letter)
      Removes specified tile from the frame.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the frame to string format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Frame

        public Frame()
        Initializes Frame with an empty list of tiles. Must be filled using refill(Pool) method.

    • Method Detail

      • hasTile

        public boolean hasTile(Tile letter)
        Checks if Frame has given tile
        Parameters:
        letter - the Tile search for
        Returns:
        true if frame contains letter otherwise false

      • getTiles

        public java.util.List<Tile> getTiles()
        Gets the list of tiles. This is an immutable view of the list. You may not use this method to modify the contents of the frame.
        Returns:
        the list of tiles in a frame

      • removeTile

        public Tile removeTile(Tile letter)
        Removes specified tile from the frame.
        Parameters:
        letter - the letter to remove
        Returns:
        letter if it was in the Frame
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if letter was not in the Frame

      • refill

        public void refill(Pool pool)
        Refills frame with tiles from given Pool. After this frame should have exactly 7 tiles, unless the Pool was emptied.
        Parameters:
        pool - The pool to take tiles from to refill the frame.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks whether the frame is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the pool is empty otherwise false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts the frame to string format. String format looks like [A, B, C, D]
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the list of tiles in the frame as String
